thread.title: mini-documentary on women's freedom and safety in delhi
thread.title_full: mini-documentary on women's freedom and safety in delhi

author: BholeBaba
title: mini-documentary on women's freedom and safety in delhi
text: # 2 Interesting in the combination of Hindi/English - there is a new language being developed as we watch. We can expect a grammar book soon! Depressing, in the primitive attitudes displayed by the men. I have no doubt that worse and more violent emotions are prevalent outside the metropolises. If it is any comfort, the dumb-ass opinions voiced here, seemingly immune to any level of entry-level middle school logic and argument were gospel truth when i was at school 50 years ago in the UK. It has changed. It will do so in India as well, provided, as will happen, that women stand up, kick ass and refuse to take it. They will.
